title: Modified Unit Schema
description: Schema for modifiedunit.json files containing unit swaps/transformations applied by options

OptionId.description: ID of the option that triggers this modification

UnitId.description: ID of the original unit being modified

NewUnitId.description: ID of the new unit to swap to (optional). Required for types UnitGlobalChange

NewProfileId.description: ID of the new profile to swap to (optional). Required for types UnitProfileChange, ModelSwap and ModelAdd

DisplayableDataIdToRemove.description: Object mapping displayable data IDs to remove (statlines, rules, equipment)
